LanguageData.BabySick.stages.my_baby_is_sick.label: my baby {BABY_nameDef} is sick
LanguageData.BabySick.stages.my_baby_is_sick.descript: My baby is sick. I'm terrified something bad will happen to my baby.
LanguageData.BabySick.stages.my_babies_are_sick.label: my babies are sick
LanguageData.BabySick.stages.my_babies_are_sick.descr: My babies are sick. I'm terrified something bad will happen to them.
LanguageData.ChildInGrowthVat.stages.my_child_is_in_a: my child is in a growth vat
I miss my child. It's hard knowing they're floating in that machine, bypassing their childhood.
LanguageData.CribQuality.stages.good_crib.label: good crib
LanguageData.CribQuality.stages.excellent_crib.label: excellent crib
LanguageData.CribQuality.stages.masterwork_crib.label: masterwork crib
LanguageData.CribQuality.stages.masterwork_crib.descr: This crib is amazing. So comfortable.
LanguageData.CribQuality.stages.legendary_crib.label: legendary crib
LanguageData.CribQuality.stages.legendary_crib.descri: This crib is wonderful. So very comfortable. Perfect for naps.
LanguageData.EnslavedChild.stages.enslaved_child.desc: It breaks my heart to see my child forced to serve others.
LanguageData.MyChildHappy.stages.my_child_is_happy.de: Nothing makes me feel better than my kid being happy.
LanguageData.MyChildSad.stages.my_child_is_unhappy.de: I worry about my child. If they're not happy, I'm not happy.
LanguageData.MyChildrenHappy.stages.my_children_are_h: Nothing makes me feel better than my kids being happy.
LanguageData.MyChildrenSad.stages.my_children_are_unh: I worry about my children. If they're not happy, I'm not happy.
LanguageData.MyParentHappy.stages.parent_is_happy.des: I'm happy when my parents are happy.
I'm happy when my parents are happy.
It's nice to see that the young folk are doing well.
LanguageData.YoungstersSad.stages.sad_youngsters.desc: It's sad to see that the young folk are struggling.
